author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Omnicell Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.62 Including Items
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Omnicell Inc:
* OMNICELL REPORTS RESULTS FOR FISCAL YEAR AND FOURTH QUARTER 2017
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.22 TO $0.28 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.54 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.62 INCLUDING ITEMS * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $174 MILLION TO $179 MILLION * ‍NON-GAAP REVENUE FOR Q4 OF 2017 WAS $198.3 MILLION, UP $11.2 MILLION, OR 6.0% FROM Q3 OF 2017​
* ‍TOTAL PRODUCT BACKLOG FOR YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS $345 MILLION COMPARED TO $301 MILLION FOR YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2016​
* ‍FOR YEAR 2018, EXPECTS PRODUCT BOOKINGS TO BE BETWEEN $625 MILLION AND $660 MILLION​
* SEES ‍2018 NON-GAAP REVENUE TO BE BETWEEN $780 MILLION AND $800 MILLION​
* SEES 2018 ‍NON-GAAP EARNINGS TO BE BETWEEN $1.85 AND $2.05 PER SHARE​
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.39 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.98, REVENUE VIEW $807.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
